member.name: MENUBARINFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes. The caller must set this to sizeof(MENUBARINFO).

member.name: MENUBARINFO.rcBar
member.summary: The coordinates of the menu bar, popup menu, or menu item.

member.name: MENUBARINFO.hMenu
member.summary: A handle to the menu bar or popup menu.

member.name: MENUBARINFO.fBarFocused
member.summary: If the menu bar or popup menu has the focus, this member is TRUE. Otherwise, the member is FALSE.

member.name: MENUBARINFO.fFocused
member.summary: If the menu item has the focus, this member is TRUE. Otherwise, the member is FALSE.
